CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: RELX, formerly known as Reed Elsevier, is a FTSE 100 diversified information and analytics company. The firm operates across four main areas: scientific, technical, and medical (37% of 2021 sales); risk (34%); legal (22%); and exhibitions (7%). RELX Group has three listings: its primary one in London and two more in New York and Amsterdam.
